title: Rumble in the Jungle

replies.body: Erm, "tooltip no longer mentions" means it isn't listed on the ability's description, that doesn't mean that it isn't still actually reduced. I'd wait a bit and hope that's the direction they're taking it in.

I guess Im going to have go full on Mythbusters and test this.

EDIT: Still deals half damage to monsters.
if this ever becomes viable, I will have to run the rumble in the jungle skin while playing rumble in the jungle. yo dawg.
Rumble in the Jungle in the Jungle. Aw yiss.
that should be a chroma, just so you can be rumble in the jungle in the jungle in the jungle.

According to the same source, it was just a tooltip fix.

Apparently it hasn't been that way for a *looong* time already. Jungle rumble is just as good or bad as he has been for quite some time.
I AM SO READY TO RUMBLEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
